gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Clippers 111, Pelicans 95
gameRecap.excerpt: The Clippers defeated the Pelicans, 111-95, as they won their fifth game in a row and improved to 22-12 on the year. Paul George led the Clippers with 24 points (6-10 3PT) and seven rebounds as Kawhi Leonard (19 points, nine rebounds) and James Harden (eight points, 13 assists) totaled 27 points. Jordan Hawkins (13 points) and Jonas Valanciunas (13 points, 11 rebounds) led the Pelicans in the loss. The Pelicans moved to 21-15 on the year, and the loss snapped a 4-game win streak.
